name: Guilty Henry
description:
Once again you, Henry, the sordid guardian of doom, failed at your one and only job: keeping an eye on your evil master's favorite statue.

Hurry to fix your incompetence! Seek for replacement of the lost part of the statue through the shades of hell to avoid punishment.

Tap to move to the highligthed tile

A Global Game Jam 2020 entry by

Jonathan Gizendanner, programing

Tristan Thévenoz, graphics

Pierrick Oggier, sound
